description: Describes the metrics of the application configuration being exported.

parameters.name: metricsExportId
parameters.description: Identifier of the metrics export task.

nested_items.name: errorMessage
nested_items.description: Explains the error that occurred while exporting the metrics.

nested_items.name: exportLocation
nested_items.description: Specifies the name of the Amazon S3 bucket where the exported metrics is stored.

nested_items.name: bucket
nested_items.description: The name of the Amazon S3 bucket.

nested_items.name: prefix
nested_items.description: The prefix for the Amazon S3 bucket.

nested_items.name: metricsExportId
nested_items.description: Identifier for the metrics export task.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: Indicates the status of the metrics export task.
